feed.title: Lake Superior (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Lake Superior (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:08 p.m. EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.5Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Superior Provincial Park 11:00 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
Temperature: -1.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -5.4°C
Wind: ENE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow at times heavy over southern sections overnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 2 cm over southern sections. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 then increasing to 50 gusting to 70 after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 10:31 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing late in the morning. Snow at times heavy over southern sections in the morning. Local blowing snow in the morning. Amount 10 cm over southern sections. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 10:31 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 10:31 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
